'''''gorth''''' is a [[Sindarin]] word meaning "horror".<ref name=AC>{{WJ|AC}}, p. 415 (Author's note 28)</ref>
==Etymology==
*[[Sundocarme|Root]] [[NGUR]]<ref name=AC/>
==Examples==
*[[Gorthaur]]
==Other versions of the legendarium==
In the ''[[The Etymologies|Etymologies]]'' appears the [[Noldorin]] form ''goroth'' ("horror") and [[Doriathrin]] ''ngorth'' ("horror").<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 377 (root Ã‘GOROTH)</ref>
